data.title: Cumbia Samples, Nu Cumbia, Latin American Loops, Dub Sounds, EDM
data.meta_description: Cumbia Samples, Nu Cumbia, Latin American Loops, Dub Sounds, EDM Samples
data.text:
Loopmasters proudly present Nu Cumbia an exciting new sample collection straight from the heart of Latin America where heavily swung carnival rhythms merge with energetic club sounds to be played out in a psychedelic Dub arena!

Created exclusively for Loopmasters by Dub Salon, Nu Cumbia features Electronic and Acoustic recordings that fuse traditional Cumbia with Electronic Dance and Dub sounds, offering producers the first royalty free taste, of the sound that is shaking the Latin American clubs right now.

Producers can expect over 900Mb of pristine 24 Bit samples including Infectiously Swung Drums, Crisp Percussion, Super Fat Bass Lines, Psychedelic Guitars, Latin American Vocals, Traditional Accordion and Piano Licks, Dirty Synth Leads and Dubbed Out SFX all tamed through high end outboard equipment to squeeze every nuance out of each sample.

In Detail expect to find 947Mb, 24 Bit 44.1Khz loops and one shot sounds including 36 Accordion Loops, 33 Bass Loops, 50 Drum Loops, 8 Bongo Loops, 5 Conga Loops, 8 Cowbell Loops, 11 Guiro Loops, 26 Maracas Loops, 15 Timbale Loops, 45 Psychedelic Guitar Loops, 31 Synth Lead Loops, 33 Synth and Keys Loops, 48 Vocal Loops, 88 Drum shots, 14 Bass Stabs, 49 SFX, 13 Guitar Hits, 16 Synth Stabs, 62 Vocal Phrases, 350 Rex2 Files and 54 Soft Sampler Patches for, Kontakt, Halion, Exs24, Nnxt and Sfz formats.

The collection is also available in Ableton Live, Apple Loops and Reason Refill formats to purchase seperately.

Add the festival spirit into your productions with the very first of its kind. Pour yourself a Margarita, load up the demo song and sample Nu Cumbia TODAY!

Donâ€™t forget you can login and download 10 samples from this collection to test in your productions straight away, free of charge.
